thread.title: BRIEF-Emerson To Acquire Tools Business From Textron

title: BRIEF-Emerson To Acquire Tools Business From Textron

organizations.name: brief-emerson to acquire tools business from textron reuters

text:
40 AM / Updated 2 minutes ago BRIEF-Emerson To Acquire Tools Business From Textron Reuters Staff 1 Min Read 
April 18 (Reuters) - Emerson Electric Co: 
* EMERSON TO ACQUIRE TOOLS AND TEST EQUIPMENT BUSINESS FROM TEXTRON TO CREATE LEADING PORTFOLIO FOR THE PRO 
* EMERSON ELECTRIC CO - EXPECTS ACQUISITION TO BE ACCRETIVE TO EARNINGS IN FISCAL 2019 AND IMMEDIATELY ACCRETIVE TO CASH FLOW 
* EMERSON ELECTRIC CO - EMERSON EXPECTS ACQUISITION TO BE ACCRETIVE TO EARNINGS IN FISCAL 2019 AND IMMEDIATELY ACCRETIVE TO CASH FLOW 
* EMERSON ELECTRIC CO - DEAL FOR $810 MILLION Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
